Description: Sherd of East Greek pottery lotus bowl; inside glazed; outside, band at top of rim, part of pendant lotus below; inscription on outside.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), temenos (said to be)
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.596)
